p: Hernigou et al 22 performed a comparative study looking at effect of BMC cells on rotator cuff healing postarthroscopic repair. Patients treated with BMC had a significantly increased healing rate and a significant reduction in rerupture. In contrast, Mazzocca et al 23 used BMCs from the humeral head with a similar model of rotator cuff repair, and showed no statistical difference in clinical outcome at a mean of 10.6 months.
